pages.text: Every once in a while the $(l:general/time_collector)Time Collector$(/l) has store enough $(thing)Time Essence$() so you can extract some with an $(item)Amethyst Shard$().$(br)The amount that can be stored in one is constant and will be referred to as a $(thing)Time Unit$() ($(thing)TU$()).
Try using an $(item)Amethyst Shard$() on your placed $(l:general/time_collector)Time Collector$(/l). If nothing happens, wait until next morning and try again.
